# üí¨‚ö° Futuristic Real-Time Chat Application

A sleek and modern real-time chat application built with **Spring Boot**, **WebSocket (STOMP over SockJS)**, and **Thymeleaf**. It supports **emojis**, futuristic UI elements, and smooth bi-directional communication between users via WebSocket technology.

---

## üöÄ Features

- üåê Real-time messaging with WebSockets (STOMP + SockJS)
- üîí Unique session usernames (no registration required)
- üåà Responsive and animated UI using CSS3 and JS

---

## üõ†Ô∏è Tech Stack

### Backend
- ‚úÖ Spring Boot (Java 17+)
- ‚úÖ WebSocket with STOMP Protocol
- ‚úÖ SockJS fallback support
- ‚úÖ Maven for build

### Frontend
- ‚úÖ Thymeleaf template engine
- ‚úÖ Vanilla JS + Emoji Picker Library
- ‚úÖ Futuristic UI using CSS Glassmorphism & Neon buttons
